E*Trade Bootstrap

This version of Bootstrap has been customized and formatted to fit the E*TRADE brand and style guidelines. In fact, it's become the source of the style guidlines, as we build sites in code and not in Jpegs.

Documentation is in the docs folder, and all of that is generated into a styleguide visible at [http://styleguide.etradecreative.com] user: client password: Race2015!

Installation

Ideally this package should be a bower component, which pulls in its dependencies for development. However, you should be able to use this just by pointing at the css/etrade-bootstrap.css file, with the fonts folder and its contents as a sibling to the css folder. (This will allow the icon font to work). The CSS is compiled for every tagged release, so you don't have to recompile the source .scss files.

Developing with other projects

You can use the bower link command to create a symlink to this repo when working in other projects so that you can see how the changes you make to this project affect other projects that have it as a bower dependency.

To accomplish this

  1. Clone this repo to your local machine
  2. From inside the project directory run $ bower link
  3. Run gulp watch inside this project to start watching for changes
  4. From any project that has this project as a dependency, run $ bower link etrade-bootstrap
  5. Any changes you make in this project will be reflected in the target project until the next time you run bower update
